segments.text: OK . Do you want a trim , or do you want to get your hair done ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I get my hair done like his ? His girlfriend has the same hair , and she's white .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Like that Rastafarian over there ? You mean dreadlocks ? You crazy ! That'll take way too long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What kind of style are you getting done ? Can we match ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I'm gonna get a relaxer , then flip the ends up like Halle .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Can I get a relaxer , too ? And why did you say , “ You crazy ” instead of “ You ou're crazy ” ?
segments.speaker: S2
